means: 阿布鲁齐（意大利中部一地区，濒临亚得里亚海。大部分为山区，包括亚平宁山脉的最高峰--科诺峰）

sentence.Network_en: He signals Abruzzi who climbs out and begins to cross.
sentence.Network_cn: 他向Abruzzi做了个手势,Abruzzi也开始爬向墙外.

sentence.Network_en: The visitation gate closes and Abruzzi is led away.
sentence.Network_cn: 在Abruzzi身后的门关上了,他被警卫带着离开了.

sentence.Network_en: Abruzzi watches Gus greet Philly Falzone with a hug.
sentence.Network_cn: Abruzzi看着Gus与Philly互相问候并且拥抱.

means.word_mean: 1. a mountainous region of central Italy on the Adriatic
